content: continuing with the main colour this is where you can customize the length to fit the hand by adding or subtracting row at this point you should be about 1 25 less than the desired length shaping the top size medium only next round *k1 k2tog k21 ssk repeat from * one more time next round knit size large only next round *k1 k2tog k6 ssk k7 k2tog k6 ssk repeat from * one more time next round knit all sizes next round *k1 k2tog k5 ssk k5 k2tog k5 ssk repeat from * one more time next round knit next round *k1 k2tog k4 ssk k3 k2tog k4 ssk repeat from * one more time next round knit next round *k1 k2tog k3 ssk k1 k2tog k3 ssk repeat from * one more time next round knit next round *k1 k2tog k2 sk2p k2 ssk repeat from * one more time next round knit cut yarn leaving a long tail and draw the yarn through all the remaining stitches pulling them tight and securing the yarn end on the inside of the mitten thumb put the stitches held on the waste yarn back onto the needle and divide them evenly between the needles with the main colour pick up 1 stitch at left base of thumb knit the rest of the round and pick up one stitch at right base of thumb continue knitting in rounds till the thumb measures 1 5 1 75 2 or desired length next round ssk till end of round this will reduce your stitches to half the original amount cut yarn leaving a long tail and draw the yarn through all the remaining stitches pulling them tight and securing the yarn end on the inside of the mitten finish by weaving in the ends you can use the yarn tail at the base of the thumb to close any gaps that have appeared when joining the round i recommend wet blocking these mittens as slip_stitch pattern will lose any of their puckers or tightness after blocking chart b v 10 v 9 v 8 7 6 v 5 v 4 v 3 2 1 shaded squares knit with main colour and clear squares knit with contrast colour v slip_stitch as if to purl definitions m1l make 1 stitch left leaning m1r make 1 stitch right leaning k2tog knit 2 stitches together ssk slip 1 knitwise slip 1 knit knitwise place left needle into front of slipped stitches and knit them together sk2p slip 1 knit 2 together pass slipped stitch over knit 2 together
